name: On The Brink Demo
description:
Free time is an indulgence you no longer have to squander when our new line of luxury cruisers can take you twice the distance at half the cost. Welcome, intrepid explorer, to Amity. Whether you’re travelling with us as a passenger or a worker, you’ll always be cradled in the hands of opulence. With powerful, infallible technology at the helm of every cruiser, the only worry you’ll have is choosing how to spend all your hard-earned–

[TRANSMISSI0N ERR0R]

[ATTEMPTING T0 C0NNECT T0 SERVER]

[C0NNECTI0N ESTABLISHED]

"This is an automated distress call. The Eostre has sustained significant structural and technological damage. Navigation is inoperational. Seven hundred passengers remain on board. Requesting emergency evacuation from within the Voidance. Message repeating…"


Here at Amity, we understand that many unexpected setbacks can occur in your new role. We pride ourselves on compensating our employees for the things that really matter. 

Please note, the following events are considered typical risks of this position and are not covered by Amity:

  • Workplace fires
    • Our newest line of ITT0 bots are equipped with built-in fire suppression systems. Guide them towards the suspected fire and remain calm.
  • Hostile invasions resulting in:
    • Bodily Harm
    • Explosions
    • Death
  • Hull breaches
    • All workers are given a thorough fifteen-minute introductory session in spaceship maintenance to ensure they are equipped to repair possible hull damage
  • Damage to ship systems and their subsequent repairs
    • Repairing any damage to Amity property is the direct responsibility of employees on duty
    • In the event of staff being unequipped to conduct repairs, a registered mechanic may be requested and a charge will be deducted from the appropriate payslip
  • Threats made by customers and/or former employees
    • As an Amibassador, one of your main duties is to respond to customer complaints and queries in a friendly and attentive way
    • Failure to satisfy customers may result in termination and/or deductions from daily wages
  • Loss of life
    • While sad, death is inevitable. Rest assured that should you meet your end while on duty, Amity will make appropriate arrangements for burial services and send the bill to your appointed next of kin

Made By: KasteloSol and Holly Steventon

Music by: Karmen Lee
